segments.translation: 하! ...! 드디어 내 애기 Su-01ве를 꺼낼 수 있게 됐네. 이 맛이지!

segments.text: Lazy laughter comes from above.
segments.translation: 나른한 웃음소리가 하늘에서 들려왔다.

segments.text: This is where they train those little lab rats?
segments.translation: 여기가 하얀 쥐새끼들이 훈련하는 학교인가?

segments.text: Uh-huh. Five canteens ... Way better than that stupid Zeno!
segments.translation: 오호, 식당이 5개라니... 제노 따위와는 비교도 안 되는군!

segments.text: Oi, Lilya! We don't have the signal yet. You must NOT take off!
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee
segments.translation: 어이, 릴리야! 아직 신호 안 왔어. 절대 이륙하면 안 돼!

segments.text: Get down here, now!
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee
segments.translation: 당장 여기로 내려와!

segments.text: Nobody cares, dude. There will always be a signal.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 아무도 신경 안 써, 친구. 신호는 항상 있을 거야.

segments.text: Either you move your ass ... or swallow my exhaust! Haha!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 빨리 비켜... 아니면 내 배기가스나 마셔! 하하!

segments.text: She leaves like a wind.
segments.translation: 그녀는 바람처럼 사라졌다.

segments.text: This is outrageous. For once I forgot my rabbit's foot and I got assigned to team up with her ...
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee
segments.translation: 이건 정말 말도 안 돼. 하필 토끼발을 깜빡하고 안 가져온 날에 그녀랑 팀을 짜게 되다니...

segments.text: He looks at the lookout tower from a distance. Behind him, danger approaches and yet he has no idea.
segments.translation: 그는 멀리서 망루를 바라본다. 그의 뒤로 위험이 다가오고 있지만, 그는 전혀 눈치채지 못하고 있다.

segments.text: Olitiaus, two of them, are charging towards him from his blind spots.
segments.translation: 오리티우 두 마리가 사각지대에서 그를 향해 돌진하고 있었다.

segments.text: Andrew, head down!!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 앤드류, 머리 숙여!!

segments.text: What ...?!
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee

segments.text: As soon as Andrew lowers his head, Lilya's Su-01ве rips the Olitiaus' abdominals with a swift and clean cut.
segments.translation: 앤드루가 고개를 숙이자마자, 릴리야의 Su-01ве가 올리티아우스의 복부를 빠르고 깔끔하게 베어 찢었다.

segments.text: Watch where you go! You gonna slice my head off if I weren't quick enough!
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee
segments.translation: 어디로 가는지 좀 봐! 내가 빨리 피하지 않았으면 머리가 잘릴 뻔했잖아!

segments.text: Shut up and take your broom.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 닥치고 빗자루나 가져가.

segments.text: See those dark "bats" there?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 저기 검은 박쥐들 보여?

segments.text: Let's see who come back with more trophies.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 누가 더 많은 전리품을 가지고 돌아오는지 보자.

segments.text: Loser loser, vodka coaster!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 패배자 패배자, 보드카 받침대!

segments.text: Oi, hey ... Wait up!
segments.speaker: Airforce Trainee
segments.translation: 어이, 야... 잠깐 기다려!

segments.text: A wrinkled note is passing in the class.
segments.translation: 꼬깃꼬깃한 쪽지 하나가 이리저리 전달된다.

segments.text: It begins its journey from the second-to-last row, and soon visits every seat in the classroom.
segments.translation: 뒤에서 두 번째 줄에서 시작된 그것은 곧 교실의 모든 자리를 돌아다녔다.

segments.text: It doesn't have a particular destination. The next student is where it would go to.
segments.translation: 쪽지는 정해진 목적지가 없었고, 계속해서 다음 학생에게 전해졌다.

segments.text: On the back of it says, "Open it."
segments.translation: 뒷면에는 열어 봐라고 쓰여 있었다.

segments.text: Umm ... Okay.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 음... 알겠어.

segments.text: After reading it, Isabella folds the note, with an odd look on her face. She passes it to the student sitting next to her.
segments.translation: 이사벨라는 쪽지를 읽은 후 이상한 표정을 지으며 접었다. 그리고 옆자리에 앉은 학생에게 건넸다.

segments.text: For whom?
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 누구를 위해서?

segments.text: Hmm ... for you ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 흠... 당신을 위해서라면...

segments.text: From whom?
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 누구한테서요?

segments.text: No idea, quit asking! Just open it and pass it down ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 몰라, 그만 물어봐! 그냥 열어서 넘겨줘...

segments.text: He unfolds the note. His face suddenly goes pale.
segments.translation: 쪽지를 펼치자 순식간에 얼굴이 창백해졌다.

segments.text: There's only one sentence on the note, written in a crooked font.
segments.translation: 쪽지에는 삐뚤빼뚤한 글씨로 간결한 문장이 적혀 있었다.

segments.text: "If ur also curious abt the world outside—9 tonight under George the Oak."
segments.translation: 만약 너도 바깥세상이 궁금하다면—오늘 밤 9시 조지 참나무 아래에서.

segments.text: Hey! Vertin!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 어이! 버틴!

segments.text: Did you write this note?
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 이 쪽지 네가 쓴 거야?

segments.text: He waves his fist; a note is in his grasp. Two more students come up to Vertin.
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 그가 주먹을 흔들자, 그의 손에 쪽지가 들려 있다. 두 명의 학생이 더 버틴에게 다가온다.

segments.text: Yes. Are you coming?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 응. 너는, 올 거야?

segments.text: Ha ... No.
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 하... 아니야.

segments.text: You are gonna shine my shoes for the rest of the week.
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 이번 주 내내 내 구두를 닦게 될 거야.

segments.text: Why? Because of this nonsense you wrote ...!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 왜냐고? 네가 쓴 이 헛소리 때문에...!

segments.text: Seems like you need another lesson in the guardhouse, huh?
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 영창에서 한 번 더 교육받아야겠군, 그렇지?

segments.text: I have the accusation AND the evidence. Surely you don't want one of the instructors to have it, right?
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 고발장도 있고 증거도 있어. 설마 교관들한테 이걸 넘기고 싶지는 않겠지?

segments.text: Damn it ... No! Don't you change the subject!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 젠장... 안 돼! 화제를 돌리지 마!

segments.text: Not only did you pass notes in class, but also did so to spread such ... such horrifying information ...!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 수업 시간에 쪽지를 돌린 것도 모자라서, 그런... 그런 끔찍한 정보를 퍼뜨리다니...!

segments.text: Ha, you don't want this to be given to the instructors, do you?
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 하, 이걸 강사들한테 넘겨주고 싶지는 않겠지?

segments.text: So that's what you mean ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그런 뜻이었구나...

segments.text: I don't care, Joseph. You can deal with it as you want.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 상관없어, 요셉. 쪽지는 네 마음대로 해.

segments.text: Come on, cut the crap! Shine my shoes for a week or cry in the guardhouse again!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 야, 그만 헛소리해! 일주일 동안 내 구두나 닦든지 아니면 또 영창에서 울든지 해!

segments.text: I'm messing with you. How would you prove that I wrote it?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 조금 전엔 그냥 해 본 말이야, 내가 썼다는 걸 어떻게 증명할 건데?

segments.text: You ...!
segments.speaker: Joseph

segments.text: That's not what my writing looks like when I use my right hand.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 오른손 글씨체는 이렇지 않거든.

segments.text: And now you are the one holding the note—I could say it's you who wrote it, right?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 게다가 지금 쪽지는 네 손에 있잖아. 네가 썼을지도 모르는 일이지, 하하.

segments.text: I'll call the instructor over for you.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 대신 선생님을 불러줄게.

segments.text: You jerk ...! Err-ah!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 이 자식...! 으아악!

segments.text: Joseph's face and ears get red. He jumps on Vertin at full strength ...
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 조셉의 얼굴과 귀가 빨갛게 달아오른다. 그는 온 힘을 다해 버틴에게 달려든다...

segments.text: You freak, you're just a bastard that can't even cast an incantation!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 이 괴물아, 넌 주문 하나 제대로 못 외우는 못난 놈일 뿐이야!

segments.text: Go on, you two! I want her legs broken today!
segments.speaker: Joseph
segments.translation: 가서 해치워라, 너희 둘! 오늘은 저년의 다리를 부러뜨리고 싶다!

segments.text: The instructor is here! The instructor is here! Stop fighting!
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 선생님이 오셨다! 선생님이 오셨어! 그만 싸워!

segments.text: Children scatter and run away.
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 아이들이 뿔뿔이 흩어져 도망간다.

segments.text: There's an empty classroom right next to her. A good place to hide.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저 애 바로 옆에 빈 교실이 있어. 숨기 좋은 곳이야.

segments.text: The clamor subsides. The hallway restores its peace gradually.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소란이 가라앉는다. 복도가 점차 평온을 되찾는다.

segments.text: There is a huge, dark hole in the trunk of George the Oak. The hole connects to the ground, creating a natural fortress for animals.
segments.translation: 조지 참나무의 줄기에는 거대하고 어두운 구멍이 있다. 그 구멍은 땅과 이어져 동물들을 위한 천연의 요새를 만들었다.

segments.text: This oak has been here for 700 years. It has witnessed each of the Parade Ceremonies.
segments.translation: 이 참나무는 700년 동안 이곳에 서 있었다. 매년 열리는 순회공연을 지켜봐 왔다.

segments.text: Red squirrels and woodpeckers live in this hole all year round. Now, The Ring is kicking acorns inside. The clattering sound echoes in the huge hole.
segments.translation: 붉은 다람쥐와 딱따구리가 일 년 내내 이 구멍에서 살고 있다. 지금 고리가 안에서 도토리를 차고 있다. 딸그락거리는 소리가 거대한 구멍 안에 울려 퍼진다.

segments.text: Do you think they are gonna come?
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그들이 올 것 같아?

segments.text: What if, in the end, no one shows up ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 만약... 결국 아무도 나타나지 않는다면...

segments.text: He paces in anxiety, kicking the acorns all over the place.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그는 불안해하며 이리저리 서성거리다가 도토리들을 사방으로 발로 차버린다.

segments.text: Maybe nobody cares what's outside the school; maybe everyone's happy with what they've learnt in the school ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 아마도 아무도 학교 밖이 어떤지 신경 쓰지 않을 거야. 아마도 모두가 학교에서 배운 것에 만족하고 있을지도 몰라...

segments.text: At least there will be two ... I guess.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 최소 두 명은 올 거야... 아마도.

segments.text: Isabella ...When she just got into the school, she was crying all the time and wanted to go home. Maybe she will come ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이사벨라... 학교에 막 들어왔을 때, 계속 울면서 집에 가고 싶어했어. 아마 그 애가 올지도...

segments.text: But this is something no one can guarantee.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 이건 누구도 장담할 수 없는 일이야.

segments.text: ... It'd be good enough as long as none of the instructors show up.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...선생님이 오는 것만 아니면 괜찮다.

segments.text: Vertin! Lo ... look outside ...!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 버틴! 밖을... 밖을 봐...!

segments.text: Spots of light, just one or two of them, though dim as the fireflies, emerge in the dark.
segments.translation: 반딧불처럼 희미한 빛이 하나둘 어둠 속에서 나타났다.

segments.text: Followed by many more of those.
segments.translation: 그리고 점점 더 많은 불빛이 그 뒤를 이었다.

segments.text: Like stars in the night sky, the lights move quietly and slowly, merging into a Milky Way leading here.
segments.translation: 불빛들은 밤하늘에 흩어진 별처럼 조용히 천천히 움직이며, 이곳으로 이어지는 은하수로 합쳐진다.

segments.text: They are here ...! My God, that's ... Oh, and they—Everyone is here ...!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그들이 여기 있어...! 맙소사, 저건... 아, 그리고 그들도—모두 다 여기 있어...!

segments.text: How, how come there are so many of them!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 어떻게, 어떻게 이렇게 많은 거야!

segments.text: Those are familiar faces—the silent ones during the day.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 익숙한 얼굴들이군—낮에는 조용했던 자들 말이야.

segments.text: They're ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그들은...

segments.text: Mesmer Jr., Isabella, "Penny," Matilda ... You are all here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 메스머 주니어, 이사벨라, 페니, 마틸다... 모두 왔구나.

segments.text: Counting The Ring's classmates in, half of a class has gathered here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고리까지 해서 이곳에 거의 절반의 동급생이 들어왔다.

segments.text: They jump into the tree hole one after another; the spacious hole suddenly becomes rather crowded.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 녀석들이 나무 구멍 속으로 차례차례 뛰어들어가자, 넓었던 구멍이 갑자기 꽤 비좁아졌다.

segments.text: After everyone has settled down with a place to sit or stand, there are sudden tensions in the air.
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 모든 학생들이 앉을 자리나 설 자리를 정하고 나자, 갑자기 공기 중에 긴장감이 감돈다.

segments.text: They look at each other. After all, this is a gathering that has been strictly prohibited and will be regarded as unethical and evil.
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 서로를 바라본다. 결국 이것은 엄격히 금지되었고 비윤리적이며 악한 것으로 여겨질 모임이기 때문이다.

segments.text: There is a long, breathtaking silence. Eventually, someone comes forward with a question.
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 길고 숨막히는 침묵이 흐른다. 결국 누군가가 앞으로 나서며 질문을 던진다.

segments.text: Vertin ... You gathered us all here. Are you going to hold out against the principal?
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 버틴... 네가 우리를 모두 여기 모았구나. 교장에게 맞서려는 거야?

segments.text: What ...?!
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Absolutely not! I've never thought of that!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 당연히 아니지. 그런 생각은 해본 적 없어!

segments.text: Phew ... That’s a relief.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 휴... 다행이야.

segments.text: I was so nervous. That was a harsh question you asked, Mesmer! But thank goodness ...
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 너무 긴장했어. 메즈머, 정말 어려운 질문이었다고! 그래도 다행히...

segments.text: I'll be the first one out of here if it were a rebellion! This peace lover is not up against anyone!
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 반란이라면 내가 제일 먼저 여기서 나갈 거야! 이 평화주의자는 누구와도 맞서지 않는다고!

segments.text: Laughter from the crowd fills this narrow space.
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 군중들의 웃음소리가 이 좁은 공간을 가득 채우고 있어.

segments.text: Then what is it you want? We ... we came here in secrecy.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그럼 뭘 원하는 거야? 우리는... 우리는 몰래 여기 온 거라고.

segments.text: I didn't expect so many of you.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이렇게 많이 올 줄은 몰랐어.

segments.text: So many of you in school are just like The Ring and me ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 학교에 나와 고리 같은 사람이 이렇게 많을 줄은...

segments.text: ... want to know more about the things outside ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 바깥 상황을 더 많이 알고 싶어 하는구나...

segments.text: Those rumors ... Have you heard?
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그 소문들... 들어봤어?

segments.text: Yet we are prohibited not only to say "that word," but also to speak about anything related to the outside world.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 우리는 그 단어를 말하는 것뿐만 아니라 외부 세계와 관련된 어떤 것에 대해서도 이야기하는 것이 금지되어 있어.

segments.text: Our life is all about training, peace, and mankind. Nothing else.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리의 삶은 훈련, 평화, 인류 이 세 가지를 중심으로만 돌아가니까. 다른 건 없어.

segments.text: We have different hair colors, speak with different accents, and cast different arcane skills ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 분명 서로 다른 머리 색깔과 억양을 가지고 있고, 사용하는 마도술도 다른데 말이야...

segments.text: But the Student Handbook asks us to forget about all these. It aims at eliminating our differences and ensuring conformity in the school.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 학생 수첩은 우리에게 이런 것들을 모두 잊으라고 해. 학교에서 우리의 차이점을 없애고 획일성을 보장하는 게 목적이거든.

segments.text: We have found some pamphlets with poems from the outside world printed on them.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 외부 세계의 시가 인쇄된 팸플릿들을 발견했습니다.

segments.text: This is something we've never been taught in class ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 이런 건 수업시간에 배운 적이 없는데...

segments.text: That poem inspired me with so many things ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그 시를 보고 많은 것이 떠올랐어...

segments.text: We are the chosen ones. We are meant to be the backbone of the primary defense for mankind.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 선택 받은 아이들이니 제1 방어선의 기둥이 될 거야.

segments.text: But all of you here today ... Must still be curious about who you really are and what is in the world outside ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 지금 이 자리에 있는 친구들은, 분명 아직 찾지 못한 자신의 본모습과 바깥 세계에 대해 호기심을 갖고 있겠지...

segments.text: We cannot leave here, but we can know the truth through another way.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 학교에서 벗어날 수 없지만, 다른 방법으로 진실을 알아낼 수 있어.

segments.text: Fellow students, before entering the school ... Where did you live? What kind of life did you lead?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 동급생들아, 학교에 들어오기 전에... 어디서 살았고? 어떤 삶을 살고 있었어?

segments.text: Did people there cast incantations too? Did they like scone just as we do ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그곳 사람도 주문을 외울 줄 알아? 다들 우리처럼 스콘을 좋아할까...

segments.text: By piecing together our memories from all over the world, we can "rebuild" the very world outside!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 세계 각 지역에서의 추억을 통해 바깥세상의 진짜 모습을 여기서 복원할 수 있을 거야!

segments.text: Wow!
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 와!

segments.text: So that's how you know the world ...!
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 그래서 당신이 세상을 아는 방법이 그런 거였구나...!

segments.text: This is the safest method we can think of. Given that none of us are leaving the school ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 이게 우리가 생각해낼 수 있는 가장 안전한 방법이야. 우리 중 누구도 학교를 떠날 수 없는 상황에서...

segments.text: I-I tucked some of these pamphlets in my pocket! And the stained glass balls an instructor left to me when he resigned!
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 나-나는 이 팜플릿들을 주머니에 몇 개 챙겨뒀어! 그리고 사임할 때 강사님이 내게 남겨주신 스테인드글라스 구슬들도!

segments.text: I'd say these are a part of the outside world!
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 이것들은 외부 세계의 일부라고 말하고 싶어!

segments.text: Shh, silence! No one speaks before Matilda!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 쉿, 조용히 해! 마틸다 앞에서는 아무도 말하지 마!

segments.text: My name is Matilda Bouanich! I am the most senior transfer student in the school—in fact, I was too senior to be taken in, if not for that special approval. That is to say, I remember the outside world a lot more than you do ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 내 이름은 마틸다 부아니치야! 학교에서 가장 나이 많은 편입생이지—사실 특별 승인이 아니었다면 받아주기엔 너무 나이가 많았을 거야. 그러니까 말인데, 나는 너보다 바깥세상을 훨씬 많이 기억하고 있어...

segments.text: I-I'm Isabella. I was taken here at four, so I don't remember much of the outside world ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 이-이사벨라예요. 네 살 때 여기 왔어서, 바깥세상은 별로 기억이 안 나요...

segments.text: Hmm, I can recall Mother Superior used to like wearing floral dresses in pale blue, and ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 음, 원장 수녀님이 연한 파란색 꽃무늬 드레스를 즐겨 입으셨던 게 기억나는데...

segments.text: We don't have much rain from where I grew up. The cloudless sky stretched out over our head and fell into the horizon ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 내가 자란 곳은 비가 많이 내리지 않거든. 구름 한 점 없는 하늘이 우리 머리 위로 펼쳐져서 지평선까지 이어졌지...

segments.text: Our family has been psychologists for generations in the arcanum world. "Animal Magnetism" was invented by my grandfather's grandfather's grandfather's ... grandfather.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 우리 가문은 마도술계에서 대대로 심리학자였어. 동물 자기술은 우리 할아버지의 할아버지의 할아버지의... 할아버지가 발명한 거야.

segments.text: But I'm not interested in arcanists. They are all mad people, and we had to treat them after all ... They looked scary.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 하지만 난 마도술사들에겐 관심 없어. 다들 미친 사람들이거든, 결국 우리가 치료해줘야 했고... 무서워 보였어.

segments.text: Oh and, there was a big football field near my house. Bare spots were on the turf everywhere, and there was also rust on the goals ...
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 아, 그리고 우리 집 근처에 큰 축구장이 있었어. 잔디밭 곳곳에 맨땅이 드러난 곳들이 있었고, 골대에도 녹이 슬어 있었지...

segments.text: Slow down, SLOW DOWN! What's football? And goal? I can't follow ...!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 천천히, 천천히 해! 축구가 뭐야? 골은 또 뭐고? 못 따라가겠어...!

segments.text: The Ring takes down everything. The paper beneath his pen has been densely packed with words, and the note goes on for pages.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: The Ring은 모든 것을 기록해 내려간다. 그의 펜 아래 종이는 빽빽하게 글자로 채워져 있고, 메모는 여러 페이지에 걸쳐 이어진다.

segments.text: Everyone is trying hard to recall the days before coming to school. They feel warm and even united.
segments.translation: 모두가 입학 전 시절을 떠올리려 애쓰고 있다. 그들은 따스함을 느끼고, 심지어 하나가 된 기분까지 든다.

segments.text: They've never been so united before. They have different pasts, but now face the same fate. These experiences make them who they are.
segments.translation: 그들은 이전에 이렇게 단결한 적이 없었다. 서로 다른 과거를 가지고 있지만, 이제는 같은 운명을 마주하고 있다. 이러한 경험들이 지금의 그들을 만들어냈다.

segments.text: ... This is a beautiful poem.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: ... 아름다운 시네요.

segments.text: Isabella mutters at the pamphlet.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 이사벨라가 팸플릿을 보며 중얼거린다.

segments.text: I want to sing it!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 나도 불러보고 싶어!

segments.text: She suddenly stands up, which startles the group.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그녀가 갑자기 일어서자 일행이 깜짝 놀란다.

segments.text: Sing it? How?
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 노래를 불러? 어떻게?

segments.text: To the melody of our school song!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 우리 교가의 선율에 맞춰서!

segments.text: See, each word is well-matched to the rhythm!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 봐, 각 단어가 리듬과 완벽하게 맞아떨어져!

segments.text:
Nor happiness, nor harmony, nor fame,
Nor pride, nor strength, nor skill in arms or arts ... ♪
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation:
행복도, 화합도, 명성도,
자부심도, 힘도, 무예나 예술의 기예도... ♪

segments.text: ... My, they do go well together!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 어머, 정말 잘 어울리네요!

segments.text: Shepherd those herds whom blindness makes tame ... ♪
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 맹목이 순하게 만든 그 무리들을 인도하라... ♪

segments.text: Their eyes see not one light of Bright Stars ... ♪
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 그들의 눈에는 밝은 별들의 빛이 하나도 보이지 않아... ♪

segments.text: They all stood up with excitement.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 모두들 흥분해서 일어섰어.

segments.text: God, each syllable is joining the notes so well …
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 와, 음표 하나하나가 가사와 정말 잘 어우러지네...

segments.text: Is this a sign revealed by destiny? Are we told to, told to ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 이것이 운명이 보여준 징조인가? 우리에게 말하고 있는 건가, 말하고 있는 건가...

segments.text: To sing it at the Parade Ceremony!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 퍼레이드 의식에서 부르기 위해서야!

segments.text: Impossible! We will definitely get caught!
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 말도 안 돼! 우리 분명히 들킬 거야!

segments.text: But in doing so, the Big Head will hear our voices!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 하지만 그러면 빅 헤드가 우리 목소리를 들을 거야!

segments.text: They will come to realize that we ... we have this wish ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그들도 결국 깨닫게 될 거야... 우리가... 우리에게 이런 소망이 있다는 걸...

segments.text: They will understand us, won't they, Vertin? After all, it is they who brought us up and who cared for us!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그들이 우리를 이해해 줄 거야, 그렇지 버틴? 결국 우리를 키워주고 돌봐준 건 그들이니까!

segments.text: They may be upset, or blame us ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다들 언짢아하면서 우리를 나무랄지도 몰라...

segments.text: But, let's give it a try!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래도 함께 해보자!

segments.text: In the darkness, their hands join in silence.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어둠 속에서 모두가 말없이 손을 잡았다.

segments.text: The song ... sounds much better than it was before.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 노래가... 전보다 훨씬 좋아졌네.

segments.text: Two weeks later
segments.translation: 2주 후

segments.text: Today is the day of the Parade Ceremony.
segments.translation: 오늘은 정식 순회공연의 날이다.

segments.text: Junior students walk in pairs, carrying their little stools and heading to the square.
segments.translation: 하급생들이 둘씩 짝을 지어 작은 의자를 들고 광장으로 향했다.

segments.text: The student performers line up on the stage. Some palms within those white gloves have even become slightly sweaty out of anxiety.
segments.translation: 학생 공연자들이 무대 위에 줄을 서 있다. 하얀 장갑 속 손바닥 중 일부는 긴장감으로 인해 살짝 땀이 배어 있었다.

segments.text: You weren't in the dormitory last night.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 너 어젯밤에 기숙사로 안 돌아왔지.

segments.text: Were you on duty yesterday?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어제 근무였어?

segments.text: Yes, as I am today.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 지금의 저로서는요.

segments.text: I know you are planning something behind the instructors' backs. Please do not act against any regulation stipulated in the Student Handbook.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 선생님들 몰래 뭔가 계획하고 계시는 거 알고 있어요. 학생 수첩에 명시된 규정을 어기는 행동은 하지 말아 주세요.

segments.text: Otherwise, I'm obliged to report this to the instructor as the monitor student on duty.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아니면 내겐 당직 규율 위원으로서 선생님께 상황을 보고할 책임이 있으니까.

segments.text: ... Okay.
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Doves are hovering above the square.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 광장 위로 비둘기가 날아다니고 있다.

segments.text: The principal walks onto the stage from the side stair—this can be clearly seen from the stage.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 교장 선생님이 옆 계단에서 무대로 올라오시는데, 무대에서는 그게 잘 보여.

segments.text: Are we ready?
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 준비됐어?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: We got this ...!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 우리가 해낼 거야...!

segments.text: Let's do this!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 해보자!

segments.text: Good luck to us all!!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 우리 모두 행운을 빌어!!

segments.text: The whispering words of encouragement go from one to another and go on.
segments.translation: 격려의 속삭임이 한 사람에서 다른 사람으로 전해지며 계속 이어진다.

segments.text: Today, I am honored to be accompanied by the young representative of the St. Pavlov Foundation Committee, Ms. Z;
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 오늘 저는 성 파블로프 재단 위원회의 젊은 대표이신 Z 양과 함께하게 되어 영광입니다;

segments.text: the principal of our close partner, Mr. Claude Smith of Zeno Academy; and the outstanding alumni who graduated last year—
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 우리의 긴밀한 파트너인 제노 아카데미의 클로드 스미스 교장 선생님, 그리고 작년에 졸업한 뛰어난 동문들—

segments.text: to our annual Parade Ceremony!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 연례 퍼레이드 의식에 오신 것을!

segments.text: The Parade Ceremony where we show our best image and morale once a year. Each year, the best students would be selected to take a three-month intense training, and become the honor guard of our school and present the fabulous demeanor of our students.
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 1년에 한 번 우리의 최고 모습과 사기를 보여주는 퍼레이드 의식입니다. 매년 최우수 학생들을 선발하여 3개월간의 집중 훈련을 받게 하고, 우리 학교의 명예 근위대가 되어 학생들의 훌륭한 품격을 선보이게 하죠.

segments.text: And now everyone, the first part of the ceremony—school song.
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 자, 그럼 모두들, 식전의 첫 번째 순서—교가 제창입니다.

segments.text: "Peace Lives On."
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 평화는 계속된다.

segments.text: Looking down the stage, many people sit in lines like those pegs on the pipe organ.
segments.translation: 무대 아래 앉아 있는 이들의 자리도 파이프 오르간의 관처럼 가지런히 놓여 있었다.

segments.text: Isabella is the leading singer. Her voice is trembling.
segments.translation: 첫 소절을 맡은 이사벨라의 목소리가 떨리고 있다.

segments.text: Nor happiness, nor harmony, nor fame, nor pride, nor strength, nor skill in arms or arts ... ♪
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 행복도, 화합도, 명성도, 자부심도, 힘도, 무예나 예술의 기예도... ♪

segments.text: Shepherd those herds whom blindness makes tame ... ♪
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 눈멀어 순해진 양 떼들을 인도하라... ♪

segments.text: What ... what are you singing ...?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 너, 너희 뭘 부르는 거야...?

segments.text: Sonetto is in shock. Mesmer Jr. skips her lyrics and keeps singing in her tender voice.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소네트는 그대로 얼어버렸다. 메스머 주니어는 그 박자를 건너뛰고 이어서 앳된 목소리로 노래했다.

segments.text: The voice is thin and hesitant at first, but it later becomes gentler, stronger, and brighter.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 처음엔 소리가 조금 떨렸지만, 점차 부드럽고 힘차며 밝아졌다.

segments.text: And the principal sitting under the stage finally understands what they are singing.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 무대 아래에 있던 교장도 결국 가사를 제대로 들었다.

segments.text: What ... what are they singing?!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 뭐... 뭘 부르고 있는 거야?!

segments.text: Mister, Mister! They are singing that poem ... the one on the back of the pamphlet ...!
segments.speaker: Music Instructor
segments.translation: 선생님, 선생님! 저 사람들이 그 시를 부르고 있어요... 팜플릿 뒷면에 있는 그 시 말이에요...!

segments.text: She almost loses her beautiful voice in shock. She sounds tongue-tied.
segments.speaker: Music Instructor
segments.translation: 그녀는 충격에 아름다운 목소리를 잃을 뻔했다. 말이 제대로 나오지 않는 것 같다.

segments.text: Stop! You stop right now!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 멈춰! 당장 멈춰!

segments.text: Sopranos and tenors, stop right now! I forbid you to sing along!
segments.speaker: Music Instructor
segments.translation: 소프라노와 테너, 지금 당장 멈춰! 따라 부르는 거 금지야!

segments.text: Sonetto! Stop them!
segments.speaker: Instructor
segments.translation: 소네트! 저들을 막아!

segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저는...

segments.text: The song that should not have existed comes out from all around.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 존재해서는 안 될 노래가 사방에서 울려 퍼진다.

segments.text: From the front, the back, her left, and her right. The sound of the unfamiliar lyrics engulfs her like an inescapable trap.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 앞에서, 뒤에서, 왼쪽에서, 그리고 오른쪽에서. 낯선 가사의 소리가 피할 수 없는 함정처럼 그녀를 에워싼다.

segments.text: Sonetto has never felt her heart beating so fast. She becomes dizzy because of this.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소네트는 심장이 이렇게 빨리 뛰는 건 처음이었고, 아찔한 기분이 들었다.

segments.text: Sir, please, listen to us.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 교장 선생님, 우리의 말을 들어주세요.

segments.text: Please, give us a chance. Let us be ... let us be ourselves.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리에게 기회를 주세요. 우리가... 우리 자신이 될 수 있도록.

segments.text: The principal's face becomes pale. He turns to the security guard on the side.
segments.translation: 교장의 얼굴이 창백해졌다. 그는 옆에 있던 경비원을 향해 몸을 돌렸다.

segments.text: Get the girl on the right off the stage. NOW!!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 오른쪽 여학생을 무대에서 내려보내! 당장!!

segments.text: Copy that.
segments.speaker: Guard
segments.translation: 알겠습니다.

segments.text: Move! Get the water pipe attached on the tap and prepare for the Dumbitter Potion!
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 움직여! 수도꼭지에 급수관을 연결하고 덤비터 포션을 준비해!

segments.text: Splash!!
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 첨벙!!

segments.text: Um ...! Let, let go of me!
segments.speaker: Isabella

segments.text: More security guards run onto the stage from the side stairs. Isabella, standing on the fringes of the crowd, has been taken down by the guards with their batons.
segments.translation: 측면 계단에서 더 많은 경비원들이 무대로 달려 나왔다. 군중 가장자리에 서 있던 이사벨라는 경비원들의 곤봉에 맞아 쓰러졌다.

segments.text: They can barely open their eyes in the spraying potion.
segments.translation: 사방에서 뿌려대는 약물에 눈이 따가워 간신히 뜰 수 있었다.

segments.text: ... Isabella!!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...이사벨라!!!

segments.text: Isabella looks at her. This tiny girl gives her a sad smile while being pushed and pulled around by the guards by her side.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이사벨라가 그녀를 바라본다. 작은 소녀는 양옆의 경비병들에게 이리저리 끌려다니면서도 그녀에게 슬픈 미소를 보낸다.

segments.text: Protect Isabella!!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이사벨라를 지켜야 해...!!!

segments.text: Behind them, more and more people join in the singsing.
segments.translation: 뒤에서 점점 더 많은 사람들이 노래에 합류한다.

segments.text: The bewildered and helpless children have finally come to realize the adults don't see the world as they do.
segments.translation: 당황하고 무력했던 아이들은 마침내 어른들이 자신들과는 다른 세상을 보고 있다는 것을 깨닫게 되었다.

segments.text: They only have each other in this.
segments.translation: 이 상황에서 의지할 수 있는 건 서로뿐이다.

segments.text: With fear, anger, and the feeling of being deprived of the rights to know anything about the outside world for 12 years.
segments.translation: 두려움과 분노, 그리고 12년 동안 외부 세계에 대한 그 어떤 것도 알 권리를 박탈당했다는 감정과 함께.

segments.text: Against the potion, they sing with crying voices and refuse to stop.
segments.translation: 약물에 맞서 그들은 울먹이는 목소리로 노래하며 멈추기를 거부했다.

segments.text: Step back! Step back! Protect yourself. Don't get hurt!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 물러서, 뒤로 물러서라고! 다치지 말고!

segments.text: Listen, stand in circle, hand in hand! Short guys inside!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 들어, 다들 손을 잡고 원을 만들어! 작은 애들은 안으로!

segments.text: Bloody, it doesn't stop! I just want them to shut up! Is the tear gas in position? Shoot it above them!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 젠장, 멈추질 않는군! 저놈들 좀 조용히 시켰으면 좋겠어! 최루탄 준비됐나? 저들 위로 쏴!

segments.text: Tear gas is here ...
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 최루탄이 여기 있어...

segments.text: Watch out for the guard batons. Don't get hur ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 경비봉 조심해, 당하지...

segments.text: Pap!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 팝!

segments.text: I said shoot it ABOVE them! Why did you shoot it AT them?!
segments.speaker: Principal
segments.translation: 저들 위로 쏘라고 했잖아! 왜 저들한테 직접 쐈어?!

segments.text: It, it, it slipped in my hand ...
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 그, 그, 그게 손에서 미끄러져서...

segments.text: This is a song with a surprising opening and a forbidden ending.
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 놀라운 시작과 금기된 결말을 가진 노래로군.

segments.text: The end of the farce.
segments.speaker: Safety Supervisor
segments.translation: 이 우스꽝스러운 연극도 이제 끝이군.

segments.text: We've investigated the event in the school.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 학교에서 일어난 사건을 조사했습니다.

segments.text: Incited by the Manus pamphlets, a girl named Vertin assembled about 20 students to sing a revised version of the school song at the Parade Ceremony.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 재건의 손 팜플릿에 선동당한 버틴이라는 소녀가 약 20명의 학생들을 모아 퍼레이드 의식에서 개정된 교가를 불렀어.

segments.text: Principal Richard and the safety supervisor failed to dissuade them, and thus deployed guards, Dumbitter Potion, and non-lethal weapons.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 교장 리처드와 안전 감독 주임은 설득해 막아보려 했으나 실패했고, 결국 특수 경비원과 침묵약, 진압용 총을 동원했습니다.

segments.text: During the conflict, Vertin's lap was accidentally shot by a non-lethal weapon. She fell into a coma.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 충돌 중 진압용 총이 실수로 버틴의 대퇴부에 발사되었고, 그로 인해 정신을 잃었습니다.

segments.text: With the treatment provided by the school clinic, she was discharged after making a full recovery. She should be back to school today.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 현재는 학교 내 병원에서 치료받고 회복되어 퇴원한 상태입니다. 오늘 학교로 돌아갔을 겁니다.

segments.text: ... What a bad move.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: ... 정말 최악의 수였군.

segments.text: Whose move?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 누구 차례입니까?

segments.text: Constantine shakes her head. She doesn't intend to respond.
segments.translation: 더 이상 대답할 생각이 없는 듯 콘스탄틴은 고개를 내저었다.

segments.text: What was their appeal?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그들의 매력이 뭐였지?

segments.text: They wanted to know the outside world ... especially, the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 바깥 세계를 알고 싶어 합니다... 특히 폭풍우에 관해서요.

segments.text: This Vertin, is the one that we know of?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이 버틴이, 우리가 알고 있는 그 사람이야?

segments.text: The kid who stretched her arms outside the front gate to catch a frog during the "Storm"—THAT Vertin?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 폭풍우 때 정문 밖으로 팔을 뻗어서 개구리를 잡으려던 그 꼬마—그 버틴 말이야?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: If I recall correctly, the report described her arm didn't show any signs of change after getting soaked in the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 내가 기억하기로는, 보고서에 그녀의 팔이 폭풍우에 흠뻑 젖은 후에도 아무런 변화의 징후를 보이지 않았다고 기술되어 있었어.

segments.text: Nor inflammation, nor decaying, nor deformation, nor any other diseases.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 염증도, 부패도, 변형도, 그 어떤 질병도 없다.

segments.text: She's special. Makes me think of her mother.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 특별한 아이야. 어머니가 생각나는군.

segments.text: ... I've never met her mother. Such a pity.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: ...전 만나보지 못해서 꽤나 아쉽군요.

segments.text: Constantine returns to her chessboard. Her eyes glimmer in the dark.
segments.translation: 체스 테이블 앞으로 돌아온 콘스탄틴의 눈에 어둠 속에서 흐릿한 빛이 떠올랐다.

segments.text: Please inform Richard that the school is now under special supervision. The committee will take charge from here.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 리처드에게 전해주세요. 학교가 이제 특별 감시 하에 놓였다고요. 위원회에서 여기부터는 담당하겠습니다.

segments.text: What's the plan now?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어떻게 하실 생각이십니까?

segments.text: We have made a bad move.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 잘못된 수를 뒀군.

segments.text: They've made it such a scene, which will inevitably place us on the opposite side of those kids.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 저들이 이렇게 큰 소동을 벌여놓으니, 결국 우리가 그 아이들과 대립하게 될 수밖에 없군.

segments.text: They sowed a seed of doubt in those children.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그 아이들에게 의심의 씨앗을 심어놨군.

segments.text: What happened this time will have a long-lasting effect, and Manus will not sit tight by it.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이번 일은 오래도록 영향을 미칠 것이고, 재건의 손이 가만히 있지는 않을 거야.

segments.text: And I ...
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그리고 나는...

segments.text: I need Vertin to grow.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 버틴이 성장해야 해.

segments.text: The way I prefer.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 내가 선호하는 방식이지.

segments.text: When an Olitiau gets nervous, it may attack people.
segments.speaker: Instructor
segments.translation: 올리티아우가 긴장하면 사람을 공격할 수도 있어.

segments.text: Whenever this happens, we need to lower our body as much as we can and act friendly to avoid irritating it ...
segments.speaker: Instructor
segments.translation: 이런 일이 생기면 최대한 몸을 낮추고 친근하게 행동해서 자극하지 않도록 해야 한다...

segments.text: An opened notebook is passed quietly from the other side of the table.
segments.translation: 테이블 반대편에서 펼쳐진 공책이 조용히 건네졌다.

segments.text: It is a copy of class notes for this week.
segments.translation: 이번 주 수업 필기를 복사한 것이다.

segments.text: I ... I think you may find this helpful.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 나... 난 네가 필요할 거 같아서.

segments.text: You're welcome. Are you feeling better now?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 천만에. 몸은 좀 괜찮아졌어?

segments.text: I heard you were in a coma for two days.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이틀간 의식이 없었다고 들었어.

segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저는...

segments.text: I may have misunderstood you. I'm sorry ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 예전에 내가 널 좀 오해했던 것 같아. 정말 미안해...

segments.text: How are you feeling now? I heard you were in a coma for two days.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 지금 기분은 어떠세요? 이틀 동안 의식을 잃고 계셨다고 들었어요.

segments.text: I'm fine. It doesn't hurt so much now. It hurt more when the tear gas burnt me.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 괜찮아. 이제 그렇게 아프지 않아. 최루탄에 화상을 입었을 때가 더 아팠어.

segments.text: Sonetto drops her head. She seems out of words.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트는 무슨 말을 해야 할지 모르겠다는 듯 고개를 숙였다.

segments.text: The song ... was beautiful.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그 노래... 정말 좋았어.

segments.text: ... Glad to hear you say so.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...그렇게 말해주니 정말 기쁘네.

segments.text: But we won't sing it anymore. I think other students are still locked in the guardhouse ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 다시는 부르지 않을 거야. 나 말고 나머지 친구들은 아직 구금실에 있겠지...

segments.text: Yes. I heard it's dreadful in there ... I went to visit with some food but was turned away by the instructor.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네. 그곳 상황이 심각하다고 들었어요... 음식을 가져다주려고 방문했는데 강사에게 거절당했거든요.

segments.text: They will be out next week ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다음 주에는 풀려날 거야...

segments.text: They are welcome to borrow my notes.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 친구들한테 내 노트 빌려줘도 돼.

segments.text: Thank you for your kindness.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 신경 써 주셔서 감사합니다.

segments.text: I hope they will have the chance to use them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그들에게 기회가 주어지길 바라.

segments.text: Hello, I'm here to return this book.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안녕하세요. 이 책 반납하러 왔는데요.

segments.text: Sure.
segments.speaker: Librarian
segments.translation: 그래.

segments.text: She looks up and sees Vertin. She briefly adjusts her glasses and looks down at the book again.
segments.translation: 그녀가 고개를 들어 버틴을 본다. 잠시 안경을 고쳐 쓰고 다시 책을 내려다본다.

segments.text: Selected Speeches of School Principals.
segments.translation: 교장 연설문 선집.

segments.text: I'm glad to see you reflecting on your actions. The principal and the instructors would never do harm to their students. I think you understand now.
segments.speaker: Librarian
segments.translation: 네가 자신의 행동을 되돌아보고 있어서 다행이야. 교장 선생님과 강사들은 절대 학생들에게 해를 끼치지 않아. 이제 이해했을 거라고 생각해.

segments.text: Thank you, instructor.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 감사합니다, 선생님.

segments.text: I will be on my way. Hope you have a wonderful day.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저 먼저 가볼게요. 좋은 하루 보내세요.

segments.text: The librarian, with satisfaction, watches Vertin leave. She places the book on top of the stack located on a trolley.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사서는 만족스러운 표정으로 버틴이 떠나는 모습을 지켜본다. 그녀는 책을 수레 위에 쌓인 책더미 맨 위에 올려놓는다.

segments.text: Isabella, put these back on the shelf.
segments.speaker: Librarian
segments.translation: 이사벨라, 이것들 다시 책장에 꽂아 둬.

segments.text: Yes, Miss.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 네, 아가씨.

segments.text: She takes the trolley and slowly walks into the collection area.
segments.translation: 그녀는 트롤리를 끌고 천천히 수집 구역으로 걸어 들어갔다.

segments.text: Isabella stops at a quiet corner. She starts to flip through the pages of Selected Speeches of School Principals.
segments.translation: 이사벨라가 조용한 구석에 멈춰 섰다. 그녀는 『교장 연설문 선집』의 페이지를 넘기기 시작했다.

segments.text: ——"I have very important things to say to you."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ——너에게 아주 중요한 얘기가 있어.

segments.text: Isabella calmly leaves the book on the shelf next to her. Yet apparently, this is not where the book belonged.
segments.translation: 이사벨라는 아무렇지 않은 듯 책을 옆 책장에 놓았다. 하지만 그곳은 분명 책의 원래 자리가 아니었다.

segments.text: Ten minutes or so later, The Ring shows up on the same floor.
segments.translation: 10여 분 뒤, 고리도 같은 층에 모습을 드러냈다.

segments.text: He wanders around casually and soon grabs a book that doesn't seem to fit his character.
segments.translation: 그는 아무렇지 않은 듯 돌아다니다가 곧 자신의 성격과는 전혀 어울리지 않는 책 한 권을 집어 들었다.

segments.text: ——"I know a place. It is right beneath this building."
segments.translation: -내가 적당한 곳을 한군데 알아. 바로 이 건물 아래야.

segments.text: ——"Nice. Girls' dorm, right? Don't worry. Easy enough for me."
segments.translation: -좋아, 여학생 기숙사 말이지? 아, 안심해... 난 괜찮으니까.

segments.text: The Ring stops writing and leaves his note in the book.
segments.translation: 고리는 글씨를 쓰던 펜을 멈추고 쪽지를 책 사이에 밀어 넣었다.

segments.text: People are walking around and minding their own business. No one notices him putting an ordinary book back onto the shelf.
segments.translation: 사람들이 오가며 각자 할 일에 신경 쓰고 있었다. 평범한 책 한 권을 책장에 돌려놓는 그를 눈치채는 이는 아무도 없었다.

segments.text: This time the book has changed to A Study of SPDM History: An Everlasting Order.
segments.translation: 이번에는 책이 《SPDM 역사 연구: 영원한 질서》로 바뀌어 있었다.

segments.text: This tunnel is transformed from a military site. It goes on in all directions in dark. An occasional rustle echos between the walls.
segments.translation: 군사 시설을 개조해 만든 이 터널은 어둠 속에서 사방으로 연결되어 있었고, 이따금 벽 사이로 바스락거리는 소리가 울려 퍼졌다.

segments.text: Eight or nine students are standing here, face to face, not even making the slightest sound.
segments.translation: 이곳에 8, 9명의 학생이 서로 마주 보고 서 있었지만, 조그마한 소리조차 내지 않고 있었다.

segments.text: I went to Mesmer Jr.'s dorm and the teaching building to look her up, but she's not in any of the places ... So I just came on my own!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 메즈머 주니어 기숙사랑 교육동까지 다 찾아봤는데 어디에도 없더라고... 그래서 그냥 혼자 왔어!

segments.text: Probably she's studying in secret. Good for her, but she will not get the better of me, humph!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 아마 몰래 공부하고 있을 거야. 좋은 일이지만, 나를 이길 수는 없을 걸, 흥!

segments.text: What about the others? I can see some people are missing.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 다른 사람들은 어떻게 된 거야? 몇 명이 빠진 것 같은데.

segments.text: They no longer speak to me after coming out of the guardhouse ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 경비실에서 나온 후로는 더 이상 나에게 말을 걸지 않아...

segments.text: These are all the companions we have now.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 지금 우리가 가진 동료들은 이게 전부야.

segments.text: It's alright, "Ring." What we're going to do this time ... is much more dangerous than last time, and we may lose everything we have ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 괜찮아, 고리. 우리가 이번에 하려는 일은... 지난번보다 더 어렵고 위험할 테니까. 그리고 모두 잃을 가능성도 있고...

segments.text: We're here because we've made up our minds.
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 우리는 마음을 정했기 때문에 여기 있는 거야.

segments.text: If not for the Ceremony ... I wouldn't have thought ...
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 의식이 아니었다면... 생각해보지도 않았을 텐데...

segments.text: That the principal, as well as the instructors, are afraid of us knowing even the slightest thing about the outside world ... They are even more afraid that we would become puppets that break away from the threads.
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 교장선생님과 선생님들이 우리가 외부 세계에 대해 조금이라도 알게 되는 걸 두려워한다는 것... 그리고 우리가 실을 끊고 벗어나는 꼭두각시가 되는 것을 더욱 두려워한다는 것 말이야.

segments.text: I don't wanna live like this anymore ...
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 더 이상 이렇게 살고 싶지 않아...

segments.text: Vertin, that's why you gathered us here, right?
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 버틴, 그래서 우리를 여기 모은 거지?

segments.text: When I vomited in the guardhouse because of extreme hunger ... I prayed that one day ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 극심한 배고픔 때문에 경비실에서 토했을 때... 언젠가는...

segments.text: Look, this is the full map of our school, including the aerial view of the school and the blocks nearby.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 봐, 이게 우리 학교 전체의 지도야. 조감도와 주변 구획도까지 포함되어 있어.

segments.text: I've found the technical drawings of the air defense renovation in the library and added the missing underground tunnel part to the map.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 도서관에서 방공호 개조 당시의 도면을 찾아 지도의 지하 통로 부분에 추가했어.

segments.text: I didn't realize until I put all these together and found that the underground air-raid tunnel connects the northwest and southeast watchtowers. And the two first floors of these towers are the only two exits towards the outside world aside from the gate.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 모든 걸 종합해서 알아낸 건데, 지하 방공호 터널이 북서쪽과 남동쪽 망루를 연결하고 있어. 그리고 이 두 망루의 1층이 정문 말고는 외부로 나갈 수 있는 유일한 출구야.

segments.text: The air-raid tunnel ... How clever!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 방공호라니... 정말 영리하군!

segments.text: You see, it is impossible to sneak out from the front gate under their surveillance from the watchtowers.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 보다시피, 망루에서 감시하고 있는 상황에서 정문으로 몰래 빠져나가는 건 불가능해.

segments.text: Haha! Having such an open view, they will never see us coming out from underneath ...! A blind spot attack!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 하하! 이렇게 탁 트인 시야를 가지고 있으니, 우리가 아래쪽에서 나오는 걸 절대 못 볼 거야...! 사각지대 공격이다!

segments.text: Then which one of the two towers are we going to? Have you planned out the route?
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그럼 두 탑 중 어느 쪽으로 갈 거야? 경로는 계획해뒀어?

segments.text: The safest plan is to go to the clinic through the girls' dormitory. There is only a door between the southeast watchtower and the clinic. Taking the Shamirs with us then we don't have to worry about the keys.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가장 안전한 방법은 여학생 기숙사를 통해 의무실로 가는 거야. 남동쪽 망루와 의무실 사이에는 문 하나밖에 없거든. 샤미르들을 데리고 가면 열쇠 걱정은 안 해도 돼.

segments.text: The map only shows the blocks outside the southeast watchtower. I noticed that there are many options for transportation in the neighborhood, easy for escape.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지도상에는 남동쪽 감시탑 문밖의 구역만 표시되어 있어. 내가 봤는데 그 일대에 교통편이 많아서 도망치기 쉬울 것 같아.

segments.text: This is a nice map ... Where did you get it?
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 좋은 지도네... 어디서 구한 거야?

segments.text: Air-dropped by one of the Olitiaus. You have to be quick and stealthy in collecting them ... Hehe, that's my ring's for.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 올리티아우스 중 하나가 공중 투하한 거야. 빠르고 은밀하게 수집해야 해... 헤헤, 그게 바로 내 반지의 용도거든.

segments.text: The number of Olitiaus has recently increased. Airdropping packages with various stuff ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 요즘 학교 상공에 오리티우가 많아졌어. 던지는 물건도 다양하고...

segments.text: Maps, newspapers headlining Foundation Cover-ups, survival guides ... they even dropped some field rations recently.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지도, 재단의 은폐 공작을 다룬 신문 헤드라인, 생존 가이드... 최근엔 야전 식량까지 떨어뜨리고 있어.

segments.text: By coincidence or not, I think this "Manus Vindictae" is helping us all the time ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우연일 수도 있겠지만, 뭔가 이 재건의 손이라는 단체가 계속 우리를 도와주고 있는 것 같아...

segments.text: That'd be great then! We should thank them dearly after we get out!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그럼 정말 좋겠네! 여기서 나가면 그분들께 꼭 고마움을 표해야겠어!

segments.text: Yes, we should!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 응, 그래야지!

segments.text: Ahem! I also have news about our timing to move. The headquarters will visit our school in five days. Before their arrival, the school will keep tabs on us.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 에헴! 나도 우리가 움직일 타이밍에 대한 소식이 있어. 본부에서 5일 후에 우리 학교를 방문할 예정이야. 그들이 도착하기 전까지 학교 측에서 우리를 감시할 거야.

segments.text: That's why we should leave on the next day after those big guns have left. I know how it's gonna be, that all the instructors and securities will be as lax as the crumbs from a pandoro. Nothing will keep them getting together!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그래서 그 거물들이 떠난 다음 날 우리가 나서야 하는 거야. 뻔해, 모든 교관들과 경비원들이 판도로 부스러기처럼 느슨해질 거라고. 그들이 모이는 걸 막을 건 아무것도 없어!

segments.text: Good, then this is it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아, 그럼 그렇게 하자.

segments.text: Prepare food and clothes ... The "break-away" action starts a week later from now!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다들 그동안 비상식량과 옷가지를 준비해둬... 일주일 후 정식으로 탈옥 작전을 시작한다!

segments.text: No problem!
segments.speaker: All Students
segments.translation: 문제없어!

segments.text: Every face is aglow with hope.
segments.translation: 모두의 얼굴에서 광채가 반짝였다.

segments.text: The Ring and Isabella walk the rest of the group back to their dorm. The emergency light casts long shadows of them on the floor.
segments.translation: 링과 이사벨라가 나머지 일행을 기숙사까지 데려다 주었다. 비상등이 바닥에 그들의 긴 그림자를 드리웠다.

segments.text: Vertin ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 버틴...

segments.text: A frightened voice comes from behind.
segments.translation: 뒤에서 겁에 질린 목소리가 들려왔다.

segments.text: What's wrong? Matilda, you look like you're crying.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜 그래? 마틸다, 울고 있는 것 같은데.

segments.text: I-I can't be a part of this ... this "break-away" action ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 나-나는 이런... 이런 이탈 행동에 참여할 수 없어...

segments.text: I didn't know this is what you planned to do ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 이런 계획을 세우고 계셨는지 몰랐어요...

segments.text: Unlike you and the others, it was my own wish to be transferred here ... One time I saw the school's ceremony by the campus fence, and she ... No, never mind that.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 너희들과는 달리, 여기로 전학 온 건 내 자신의 의지였어... 한번은 교정 울타리 너머로 학교 행사를 본 적이 있는데, 그녀가... 아니야, 그냥 넘어가자.

segments.text: To put it in brief, I can't keep messing about with you people anymore! No matter how they have disciplined us, how awful they sometimes could be ... I've never thought about leaving here!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 간단히 말해서, 더 이상 너희들과 이런 식으로 지낼 수는 없어! 그들이 우리를 아무리 혹독하게 훈련시키고, 때로는 아무리 끔찍했다고 해도... 난 여기를 떠날 생각은 한 번도 해본 적이 없어!

segments.text: I, Matilda Bouanich, haven't become the top student in school ...
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 나, 마틸다 부아니치가 학교 최고 학생이 된 건...

segments.text: Matilda ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마틸다...

segments.text: We won't force you to do anything you don't want to. After all, we're here because ... we are longing for freedom.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너희가 원하지 않는 일은 강요하지 않을 거야. 어쨌든 우리가 여기 있는 이유는... 자유를 갈망하기 때문이니까.

segments.text: We once fought side by side. That would be enough.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리가 어깨를 나란히 하고 싸웠던 것만으로도 이미 충분해.

segments.text: Oh, by the way, could you tell our plan to Mesmer Jr. for me? She is one of us too. I don't want to leave her behind.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아, 그런데 메즈머 주니어에게 우리 계획을 전해줄 수 있어? 그 애도 우리 편이거든. 혼자 남겨두고 싶지 않아.

segments.text: ... Thank you.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: ... 고마워.

segments.text: I promise to tell her about this.
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 그녀에게 이 일에 대해 말해주겠다고 약속할게.

segments.text: Vertin! Come help us! There are so many critters here ...!
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 버틴! 와서 도와줘! 여기 벌레들이 너무 많아...!

segments.text: They're sticking to the door. We can't open it!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 문에 달라붙어 있어. 열 수가 없어!

segments.text: Let me! Get away ...! Let me try a new trick on them ...!
segments.speaker: Matilda
segments.translation: 내가 할게! 비켜 ...! 새로운 기술을 써보게 해줘 ...!

segments.text: Matilda wipes her eyes and runs towards the critters.
segments.translation: 마틸다가 눈물을 닦고 작은 동물들을 향해 달려간다.

segments.text: You've done an excellent job, Mesmer Jr.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 잘했어, 메즈머 주니어.

segments.text: Taking care of all those patients who suffered from the "Storm" must have been quite harsh, right? I am sorry you had to go through all these at such a young age.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 폭풍우로 고통받은 환자들을 돌보는 일이 꽤 힘들었을 거야. 그런 어린 나이에 그런 일들을 겪어야 했다니 미안해.

segments.text: The Mesmers and we have a long history working together ... I believe you, as the heir, will be strong enough to know the truth ...
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 메스머들과 우리는 함께 일해온 긴 역사가 있어... 후계자인 너라면 진실을 알 만큼 충분히 강할 거라고 믿어...

segments.text: ... of the "Storm."
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: ... 폭풍우의.

segments.text: ... They are ... mad people ...
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: ... 그들은... 미친 사람들이야...

segments.text: They were once ordinary people just like us.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그들도 한때는 우리와 같은 평범한 사람들이었어.

segments.text: It was not their fault. They were just not ready to take the truth.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그들의 잘못이 아니야. 단지 진실을 받아들일 준비가 되어 있지 않았을 뿐이지.

segments.text: Not everyone can be as strong as you are, Mesmer Jr. Here we have many other patients waiting for your help.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 모든 사람이 메스머 주니어, 당신처럼 강할 수는 없어요. 여기엔 당신의 도움을 기다리는 다른 환자들이 많이 있거든요.

segments.text: ... I will try my best.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: ... 최선을 다해보겠습니다.

segments.text: There's one more thing we found in your locker.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 당신 사물함에서 발견한 게 하나 더 있어.

segments.text: She raises her hands and shows Mesmer Jr. a map with marks.
segments.translation: 그녀가 손을 들어 올리자 표시가 적힌 지도가 메스머 주니어에게 보였다.

segments.text: Do you mind if we keep it for you? It looks like a new plan from a friend of yours.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 우리가 대신 보관해도 될까요? 당신 친구가 보낸 새로운 계획서 같은데요.

segments.text: Vertin ...
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 버틴...

segments.text: Please, help them. They don't know ... They have no idea what happened ...
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 제발, 그들을 도와주세요. 그들은 몰라요... 무슨 일이 일어났는지 전혀 모르고 있어요...

segments.text: Don't let them be in danger ...
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 그들을 위험에 빠뜨리면 안 돼...

segments.text: Of course. That's what I'm here for.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 물론이지. 그러려고 여기 있는 거니까.

segments.text: Go have some rest now. Maybe there will be new patients coming in the next few days.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 가서 좀 쉬어. 앞으로 며칠 동안 새로운 환자들이 올지도 모르거든.

segments.text: Thank you for telling me all these ... Thank you.
segments.speaker: Mesmer Jr.
segments.translation: 이 모든 걸 말해줘서 고마워... 정말 고마워.

segments.text: She leaves sobbing.
segments.translation: 그녀는 흐느껴 울며 떠났다.

segments.text: Constantine holds a chess piece in her hand and looks outside the window.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴이 체스 말을 손에 쥐고 창밖을 바라본다.

segments.text: The other door in the room opens.
segments.translation: 방안의 다른 쪽 문이 열렸다.

segments.text: The white figure comes forward at a brisk pace.
segments.translation: 새하얀 형체가 빠르게 앞으로 다가왔다.

segments.text: He spoke. We have the time of the next "Storm."
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그가 말했습니다. 다음 폭풍우의 시간을 알아냈습니다.

segments.text: They predicted that it will take place in the 27th evening this month.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이번 달 27일 저녁에 일어날 것으로 예측하고 있습니다.

segments.text: Constantine turns to Madam Z; her face is glowing in the dark with a smile.
segments.translation: 콘스탄틴이 Z를 향해 몸을 돌렸다. 어둠 속에서 그녀의 얼굴이 미소와 함께 빛나고 있었다.

segments.text: You see, I was right on this. Threats would never have persuaded a Manus Vindictae to speak to us ... but interest and love would.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 봐, 내 말이 맞았잖아. 위협으로는 재건의 손이 우리와 대화하도록 설득할 수 없었을 거야... 하지만 관심과 사랑이라면 가능하지.

segments.text: Thanks to our scout squad, we have not only found the post commanding the Olitiaus, but also captured a prisoner. And now, the problem with Vertin has also been taken care of.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 정찰대 덕분에 올리티아우스들을 지휘하는 거점을 찾았을 뿐만 아니라 포로도 잡았다. 그리고 이제 버틴 문제도 처리됐고.

segments.text: Hmm ... The "break-away" action starts on the 20th ... Why ...?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 흠... 이탈 작전이 20일에 시작되는군... 왜...?

segments.text: Oh. I see ...
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 아. 그렇구나...

segments.text: Do you have anything in mind?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어떤 생각이 있으신 겁니까?

segments.text: Madam Z also walks next to the table, looking down at the map.
segments.translation: Z도 테이블 옆으로 다가와 고개를 숙이고 지도를 보았다.

segments.text: We don't know which of the students have been involved in this plan. But we can send people to the watchtower and rescue those lost lambs on that day.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어떤 학생들이 이 계획에 연루되었는지는 모르겠지만, 망루에 사람을 보내서 그날 길을 잃은 어린양들을 구출할 수는 있어.

segments.text: No, heh heh ... My dear.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 아니야, 헤헤... 내 사랑.

segments.text: I want the inspection date to be put off to the 26th, and have everyone stay on their posts before then. We will remove one of the guards from each of the watchtowers after the 26th.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 검사 날짜를 26일로 미뤄두고, 그때까지는 모든 인원이 각자 배치된 곳을 지키도록 해. 26일 이후에는 각 망루에서 경비원을 한 명씩 빼도록 하겠어.

segments.text: In the meantime, get rid of the door in the air-raid tunnel from the girl's dorm to the clinic, install a new door made of lead compounds.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그동안 여학생 기숙사에서 의무실로 이어지는 방공호 터널의 문을 치우고, 납 화합물로 만든 새 문을 설치해.

segments.text: Also, transfer some of the patients in the Foundation to the school clinic. Make sure the clinic is 24-hour secured.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그리고 재단의 환자 몇 명을 학교 의무실로 이송해. 의무실은 24시간 경비를 확실히 해둬.

segments.text: These are ... I don't get it. We can't build doors with lead.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 이건... 전 이해가 안 됩니다. 게다가 납은 문의 재료로 적합하지 않습니다.

segments.text: Heh heh, still confused? This is a map air-dropped by the Manus. They will wait to pick them up outside the southeast watchtower.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 헤헤, 아직도 헷갈려? 이건 재건의 손에서 공중 투하한 지도야. 그들이 남동쪽 망루 밖에서 회수하려고 기다리고 있을 거다.

segments.text: But I will not surrender the students WE fostered and trained to the enemy.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 하지만 우리가 키우고 훈련시킨 학생들을 적에게 넘겨줄 수는 없다.

segments.text: They shall, and only shall leave from the route I planned and at the time I assigned.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그들은 내가 계획한 경로로, 내가 정한 시간에만 떠날 것이다.

segments.text: Leave?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 떠나요?

segments.text: From the route you planned ... the day after 26th ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 부회장님이 정한 루트에 따라... 26일 다음 날...

segments.text: Are you ... are you planning to ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 설마... 설마 부회장님의 생각은...

segments.text: To fulfill their dreams.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그들의 꿈을 이루어주기 위해서.

segments.text: It is time to let them see the "Storm" with their own eyes.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이제 그들이 직접 눈으로 폭풍우를 볼 때가 됐군.

segments.text: Why?! We can't do this ... This, this is too cruel ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 어째서입니까! 이러면 안 됩니다... 이건, 이건 너무 잔혹합니다...

segments.text: Have you considered that the time they left the school ... will also be the time of the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 아이들이 학교의 경계를 벗어났을 때... 폭풍우가 닥칠 수 있다는 생각은 해보셨습니까?

segments.text: Everyone, except for Vertin, will be reversed!
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 버틴을 제외한 모두가 타임슬립 될 수 있습니다!

segments.text: Ha-ha ...
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 하하...

segments.text: ... Yes, of course you have. And it's exactly what you want ... right?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 아니, 이미 알고 계시군요. 부회장님이 기대하시는 게 바로... 이겁니까?

segments.text: We have no choice.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 어쩔 수 없어.

segments.text: Our protection, in their interpretation, has become a deception.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 우리의 보호가 그들의 해석으로는 기만이 되어버렸군.

segments.text: Nothing looks innocent anymore once it's under the cloud of suspicion, and let's not forget—the Manus has their eyes on us.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 일단 의심의 구름 아래 놓이고 나면 그 어떤 것도 무고해 보이지 않아. 그리고 잊지 말자—재건의 손이 우리를 주시하고 있다는 걸.

segments.text: If we make the best use of these sacrifices and have Vertin pledge her loyalty in return, who would condemn us for this Queen's Gambit?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 이런 희생들을 최대한 활용하고 그 대가로 버틴의 충성을 받아낸다면, 누가 우리의 이 퀸즈 갬빗을 비난하겠어?

segments.text: She's one of a kind.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그녀는 정말 특별해.

segments.text: I've been looking forward to her transformation ... since 1999.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 1999년부터... 그녀의 변화를 기대하고 있었어.

segments.text: And I need her to learn the price of rebellion.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그리고 그녀가 반역의 대가를 배워야 해.

segments.text: Do you have any other questions?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 다른 질문 있어?

segments.text: If not, you may go on with your task now.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그렇지 않다면, 이제 할 일을 계속하도록 해.

segments.text: Affirmative.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그렇습니다.

segments.text: She wraps up the paper and steps away from Constantine. Her face is barely visible under the dim lighting.
segments.translation: 그녀는 서류를 말아 올리고 콘스탄틴에게서 물러났다. 어두운 조명 아래 그녀의 표정이 거의 보이지 않았다.

segments.text: But I will never, ever, agree with this plan.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 하지만 전 앞으로도, 영원히 이번 계획에 공감할 수 없을 겁니다.

segments.text: That's just because you don't understand the game of politics.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그건 네가 정치라는 게임을 이해하지 못하기 때문이야.

segments.text: I don't ...
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 저는...

segments.text: Too bad, I'm just a scientist.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 안타깝게도 전 과학자일 뿐이라서요.

segments.text: Change of plan. Emergency, change of plan!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 계획이 바뀌었어. 긴급 상황이야, 계획 변경!

segments.text: Years after, when I think of that escape ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 몇 년 후 그때 탈출을 떠올릴 때마다...

segments.text: Still feels like I was in a chess game, playing against an invisible enemy.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 보이지 않는 상대와 대국하는 기분이었어.

segments.text: Back then, I knew nothing about chess, nor resigning, let alone the fact I was in the zugzwang.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 당시 난 체스 실력이 별로였고, 패배를 인정할 줄도 몰랐거든. 심지어 내가 체스에서 궁지에 몰렸다는 사실조차 몰랐어.

segments.text: On the night of the 27th
segments.translation: 27일 밤이 되었다.

segments.text: It's impossible to go to the clinic through the girls' dorm. The clinic is now crowded with people, and we must give up the road to the southeast watchtower.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여학생 기숙사를 통해서는 의무실로 갈 수 없어. 의무실은 지금 사람들로 붐비고 있고, 남동쪽 망루로 가는 길은 포기해야 해.

segments.text: We have another option: to go to the classroom first, then enter the air-raid tunnel from the library.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아직 다른 선택지가 남아 있어. 기숙사에서 교실을 통과해 곧장 도서관에서 지하 방공호 통로로 들어가는 거야.

segments.text: That is to say, we are heading to the northwest tower?
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 그러니까, 우리는 북서쪽 탑으로 향하는 거야?

segments.text: Exactly. Once we get down to the tunnel, we will be much safer. Have you left the window open on the first floor?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아. 방공호로 들어가면 훨씬 안전해질 거야. 1층 창문은, 잘 해놨지?

segments.text: Yes, don't worry. I didn't lock it ... Or I can take you in from the library's front door, if the window were to be locked by the caretaker.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 응, 걱정 마. 잠그지 않았어... 아니면 관리인이 창문을 잠갔다면, 도서관 정문으로 너를 안내해 줄 수도 있고.

segments.text: The most dangerous part is from the dorm to the library. Not only will we pass the classroom, but also be exposed under the surveillance of the central watchtower.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 기숙사에서 도서관까지가 가장 위험해. 교실을 지나가야 할 뿐만 아니라 중앙 감시탑의 감시에도 노출되거든.

segments.text: Leave that with me! I will cut the fuse in the central watchtower, and that should give you a five-minute blackout.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그건 내가 맡을게! 중앙 망루의 퓨즈를 끊어서 5분간 정전을 만들어줄 테니까.

segments.text: And you gotta watch out for the patrol team! I will drive them away from you.
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 그리고 순찰대를 조심해야 해! 내가 너한테서 멀리 쫓아낼게.

segments.text: Ok. Now split up. Once the central watchtower's lights is out, we move. I will see you under the A12 window of the library.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아, 지금부터 각자 움직이자. 중앙 감시탑의 불이 꺼지면 출발하는 거야. 도서관 A12 창문 아래에서 모이자.

segments.text: And these crystal earrings are gifts from Matilda before I left.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 이 수정 귀고리는 마틸다가 우리에게 작별 선물로 주는 거야.

segments.text: Wear these and we can hear each other within a certain distance.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이걸 끼면 일정 거리 안에서 서로의 목소리를 들을 수 있어.

segments.text: That's all. Be careful. I will see you soon!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이대로 진행하자. 다들 조심하고 이따 만나!

segments.text: This is The Ring. En route to the central tower. No visible personnel. All clear.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 더 링입니다. 중앙 타워로 향하는 중. 인원 확인되지 않음. 이상 없습니다.

segments.text: Copy. Be careful. Keep in touch.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 알았다. 방심하지 말고 계속 연락을 유지한다.

segments.text: Hmm? The thing ahead is ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 흠? 저 앞에 있는 건...

segments.text: ... Damn it! It's the patrol team.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: ... 젠장! 순찰대다.

segments.text: People in the classroom, distract them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 교실에 있는 친구들이 가서 순찰대를 따돌려.

segments.text: Roger that!
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 알겠습니다!

segments.text: It'll be the curfew soon. What are you doing here?
segments.speaker: Patroller
segments.translation: 곧 통행금지 시간이야. 여기서 뭐 하고 있는 거야?

segments.text: I ... I had an upset stomach and was trying to walk it off. Sorry, sir, I'm heading back to the dorm now.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 저... 저는 배탈이 나서 좀 걸어보려고 했어요. 죄송합니다, 지금 기숙사로 돌아가겠습니다.

segments.text: Stop. Show me your ID.
segments.speaker: Patroller
segments.translation: 멈춰. 신분증을 보여줘.

segments.text: Ba4. Cut off the power for the central watchtower for five minutes.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: Ba4. 중앙 망루의 전원을 5분간 차단해.

segments.text: ...! Fuse box tripped?! Now is the time! Go!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...! 퓨즈가 나갔어?! 지금이 기회야! 가자!

segments.text: Sir, sir ...! The light is out in the central tower. Please come take a look! Is it gonna be problematic?
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 선생님, 선생님...! 중앙 탑의 불이 꺼졌어요. 와서 좀 봐주세요! 문제가 생기는 건 아니겠죠?

segments.text: What ... We are going back.
segments.speaker: Patroller
segments.translation: 뭐... 우리는 돌아간다.

segments.text: Everyone, go to the library now!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금이야. 다들 도서관으로 가!

segments.text: It's difficult to sneak out of the dorm at this time ... Isabella, if we get stopped by the supervisor, be prepared for conflict.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 시간에 기숙사에서 몰래 빠져나가기는 어려워... 이사벨라, 만약 사감에게 걸리면 충돌할 각오를 해둬.

segments.text: Bb3. Are the flower bouquets for the dorm supervisor in position? There're also quite a number of gifts in them.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: Bb3. 기숙사 사감님께 드릴 꽃다발들은 제자리에 배치됐나? 그 안에 선물도 꽤 많이 들어있을 텐데.

segments.text: Heads down, stay low ... Don't get caught ... hm?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 고개 숙여... 숙이라고... 들키지 않게... 어라?

segments.text: How come there're so many visitors at the supervisor's office ... They won't see us getting by.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 감독관 사무실에 왜 이렇게 방문객이 많은 거야... 우리가 지나가는 걸 들키겠어.

segments.text: Great. Go!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아. 가자!

segments.text: How long until you get here? I'm already at the back of the library.
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 언제 도착해? 나는 이미 도서관 뒤편에 있어.

segments.text: Is the window still open at A12? The caretakers didn't notice it, did they?
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: A12의 창문이 아직 열려 있나? 관리인들이 눈치채지 못했겠지?

segments.text: Yeah, but ... window A12 is a small one! Only little girls like you can get in!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 그래, 하지만... A12 창문은 작아! 너 같은 꼬마애들만 들어갈 수 있다고!

segments.text: Ah ... How come ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 아... 어떻게 된 거야...

segments.text: I chose it for it's hidden in the corner ... This is awful ...
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 구석에 숨어 있어서 골랐는데... 이거 정말 끔찍해...

segments.text: It's ok, don't worry! Ha ...! I'm in! A11 is not locked either!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 괜찮아, 걱정하지 마! 하...! 들어갔어! A11도 잠겨있지 않네!

segments.text: You can get in through A11 too!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: A11로도 들어갈 수 있어!

segments.text: 0-0. The windows were all left opened, just in case.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 0-0. 창문들은 모두 열어둔 상태였어, 혹시 모르니까.

segments.text: The caretaker would of course be careless at work, given the inspection was just over.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 검사가 막 끝났으니 관리인이 업무에 소홀할 수밖에 없겠지.

segments.text: What's your move then, Vertin? To boldly push forward or ... start to feel skeptical?
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 그럼 어떻게 할 거야, 버틴? 과감하게 밀고 나갈 건가, 아니면... 의심하기 시작할 건가?

segments.text: Amazing, everything is going so well today. You keep watching. We will be right there!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아, 정말 순조롭네. 넌 자리를 지키고 주변을 살펴봐. 우리도 곧 따라갈게!

segments.text: Heh-heh ...
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 헤헤헤...

segments.text: The top level of the central tower smells like alcohol.
segments.translation: 중앙 감시탑 꼭대기에서 술 냄새가 났다.

segments.text: The black-out watchtower, curtained-up classroom windows, blind patrol teams ...
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 정전된 망루, 커튼으로 가려진 교실 창문들, 눈먼 순찰대들...

segments.text: Ha ...
segments.speaker: Lilya

segments.text: What a well-planned malpractice show.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 정말 치밀하게 계획된 의료사고 쇼네.

segments.text: No wonder ... burp! Giving me this fine vodka is just ... a trade for my dizzy head and half-shut eyes.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그럴 줄 알았어... 트림! 이런 좋은 보드카를 주는 건 그냥... 내 어지러운 머리와 반쯤 감긴 눈을 노린 거래였다고.

segments.text: Burp ... look who's after those kids! Hopefully I'm not too drunk to get it wrong ... Is that the good student?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 으윽... 저 애들을 노리는 게 누군지 봐! 너무 취해서 잘못 본 게 아니길 바라는데... 저게 그 모범생인가?

segments.text: Hahaha ...! Interesting. Your flying ace, reporting for duty!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 하하하...! 흥미롭네. 당신의 에이스 파일럿, 출동 준비 완료!

segments.text: She pulls out a crumpled map from her pocket and takes a few mouthfuls from the bottle.
segments.translation: 그녀는 주머니에서 구겨진 지도를 꺼내고 병에서 몇 모금 마셨다.

segments.text: A red shadow, flying low, heads towards the library.
segments.translation: 붉은 잔상이 저공으로 도서관을 향해 달려들었다.

segments.text: According to the map, we are now out of the library. Keep going, everyone!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지도에 따르면 이제 도서관을 벗어났어. 계속 가자, 모두들!

segments.text: What, what is that noise ...? It's scary.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 뭐, 뭐야 저 소리...? 무서워.

segments.text: We should be under the sports field now. Probably some big shot is having some fun with his levitating car ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 지금 운동장 아래쪽에 있을 거야. 아마 어떤 거물이 공중부양 자동차로 재미를 보고 있겠지...

segments.text: No, it's thunder.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아니, 이건 천둥소리야.

segments.text: It's about to rain.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 곧 비가 올 거야.

segments.text: Everything goes so well today ... too well maybe, making me uneasy.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왠지는 모르겠는데, 오늘따라 일이 잘 풀려서... 괜히 불안해.

segments.text: Don't think like that. Look! We are entering the northwest tower after this crossing.
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 그렇게 생각하지 마. 봐! 이 교차로를 지나면 북서쪽 탑으로 들어가게 돼.

segments.text: Who knows what will be there waiting for us. Let's ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 거기서 뭐가 우리를 기다리고 있을지 누가 알겠어. 자...

segments.text: Arrgh!!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 으아악!!

segments.text: What's wrong!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 무슨 일이야!

segments.text: Person, a person ... sits at the intersection.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 사람이, 한 사람이... 교차로에 앉아 있어.

segments.text: The person walks out under the light, wobbly.
segments.translation: 그 사람이 비틀거리며 불빛 아래로 걸어 나왔다.

segments.text: Finally? My patience is running out.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 드디어? 참을성이 바닥나고 있어.

segments.text: You are ... air force from Zeno! What are you doing here?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 넌... 제노의 공군! 여기서 뭐 하는 거야?

segments.text: Being dedicated to duty ... burp! And catch you guys!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 임무에 충실하게... 딸꾹! 그리고 너희들을 잡겠어!

segments.text: You really think escaping can be so easy?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 도망치는 게 그렇게 쉬울 거라고 생각해?

segments.text: She is a soldier with field experience. If we can't take advantage within the first few rounds ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 녀석은 실전 경험이 있는 군인이야. 몇 번 붙어봐서 상대가 안 될 것 같으면...

segments.text: You guys retreat immediately, and I'll cover for you. As long as one of us can get out of school, our plan succeeds.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너희는 바로 물러나! 내가 너희를 엄호할게. 이번 작전은 한 명이라도 학교에서 벗어날 수 있으면 성공이니까.

segments.text: Oh? I can hear you.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 어? 목소리가 들리네.

segments.text: In that case, I have to be extra careful, in case any of you lab rats runs away.
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그렇다면 더욱 조심해야겠네. 실험용 쥐들 중 하나라도 도망칠지 모르니까.

segments.text: Please be mindful of your language, Lilya!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 릴리야, 말을 조심해!

segments.text: Your duty is to eliminate the Olitiaus in the campus, not attacking the students!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신의 직무는 캠퍼스의 오리티우를 제거하는 것이지, 학생들을 공격하는 게 아닙니다!

segments.text: ...! Sonetto! Why are you here ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...! 소네트! 네가 왜 여기에...

segments.text: She walks up to Vertin and yet doesn't respond to her question. She pulls out her wand and stands before Lilya.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그녀는 버틴에게 다가가지만 질문에는 답하지 않는다. 지팡이를 꺼내 들고 릴리야 앞에 선다.

segments.text: ... Haha, seriously? Is malpractice a compulsory course in your Foundation?
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: ... 하하, 진짜야? 의료 과실이 너희 재단의 필수 과목이야?

segments.text: Then try me ... Let me see the best you got!
segments.speaker: Lilya
segments.translation: 그럼 한번 해봐... 네가 가진 최고의 실력을 보여줘!

segments.text: Lilya the Trainee
segments.speaker: FINAL BOSS
segments.translation: 견습생 릴리야

segments.text: Stono Swift!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 스토노 스위프트!

segments.text: Okay. She's now temporarily paralyzed.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 됐어. 잠시 움직이지 못할 거야...

segments.text: She places Lilya against the wall and falls silent.
segments.translation: 그녀는 릴리아를 벽에 기대어 세워두고 침묵했다.

segments.text: There are still so many mysteries.
segments.translation: 아직도 수많은 미스터리가 남아 있다.

segments.text: When did she start to follow? What are her plans and thoughts ...
segments.translation: 소네트가 언제부터 뒤따라온 건지, 어떻게 할 생각인지, 어떻게 생각하는지...

segments.text: But there is not much time left.
segments.translation: 하지만 더 이상 지체할 수 없다.

segments.text: We're leaving, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 가볼게, 소네트.

segments.text: Thank you for your assistance. Goodbye.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 도와줘서 고마워. 안녕.
