segments.text: ... You're going to do something very dangerous, aren't you?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...너 정말 위험한 일을 하려는 거지?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: Even if ... it will cost you everything you've had here ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이 선택으로... 이곳의 모든 걸 잃게 된다 해도...

segments.text: You will not be regretful, right?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 후회하지 않을 거지?

segments.text: We have prepared for everything that could happen. No regrets.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 일어날 수 있는 모든 일에 대비했어. 후회는 없어.

segments.text: Sonetto looks at the students' faces and tightly holds her wand in her hand.
segments.translation: 소네트는 학생들의 얼굴을 바라보았고, 완드를 쥔 손에 힘이 들어갔다.

segments.text: Seems like you ... won't be needing my notebook anymore.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이제... 내 노트는 필요 없을 것 같네.

segments.text: We chose a different future.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 다른 미래를 선택했어.

segments.text: But future has no right or wrong, Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 미래에는 옳고 그름이 없어, 소네트.

segments.text: The Ring pulls down the switch of the blast door.
segments.translation: 고리가 통로 방호문의 스위치를 아래로 내렸다.

segments.text: A stone wall is slowly put down before Sonetto.
segments.translation: 돌문이 소네트의 앞으로 서서히 내려왔다.

segments.text: Go back. Get yourself out of these things.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 돌아가. 우리와 너무 많이 엮이지 말고.

segments.text: Her face gradually disappears on the other side of the door.
segments.translation: 문 너머로 그녀의 얼굴이 서서히 사라진다.

segments.text: ... It was a pleasure to be your deskmate, Vertin.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ... 버틴, 당신과 같은 반이어서 즐거웠어요.

segments.text: Did you hear it? Did you hear it?
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 들었어? 들었어?

segments.text: It's the rain! It's raining outside!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 비야! 밖에 비가 와!

segments.text: Climb up the stairs and open the lock ... and then we can get in the watchtower!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 계단을 올라가서 자물쇠를 열면... 그러면 망루에 들어갈 수 있어!

segments.text: Don't let down your guard. Let me see.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아직 방심할 수 없어. 내가 봐볼게.

segments.text: It's an ordinary iron gate. Through that door frame, everything on the first floor of the northwest watchtower is plainly presented.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 평범한 철문이야. 저 문틀 너머로 북서쪽 감시탑 1층의 모든 것이 훤히 보이네.

segments.text: In the oval-shaped room, they see a wall phone, a coat rack, and some randomly hunched batons.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 타원형 방에서 그들은 벽걸이 전화기, 옷걸이, 그리고 아무렇게나 구부러진 지휘봉 몇 개를 본다.

segments.text: No signs of people on the first floor. Behind the shutters, lightning flashes and thunder rumbles outside.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 1층에는 사람의 흔적이 없어. 셧터 너머로 번개가 번쩍이고 천둥소리가 울려 퍼지고 있어.

segments.text: ... That's the gunfire for freedom.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 자유세계의 불꽃이었다.

segments.text: How are the Shamirs with the lock? Oh! Good for them. The door is unlocked ...!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 샤미르들이 자물쇠를 어떻게 했지? 오! 잘했네. 문이 열렸어...!

segments.text: Shhh ...! Don't get excited now! We haven't gone out yet!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 쉿...! 지금 흥분하지 마! 아직 나가지도 않았다고!

segments.text: One after another, keep it quiet ...! Don't touch anything.
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 한 명씩 차례대로, 조용히 해...! 아무것도 건드리지 마.

segments.text: The kids walk out of the room one after another.
segments.translation: 아이들이 하나둘씩 방을 나간다.

segments.text: There's tension in the air.
segments.translation: 공기 중에 긴장감이 감돌았다.

segments.text: The guards should be on the second floor. Let's move!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 경비들은 2층에 있을 거야. 이동하자!

segments.text: What stands between them and the outside world is a simple wooden door. There's no lock on it. It can be easily opened with a twist at the door knob.
segments.translation: 그들과 바깥세상 사이에는 단순한 나무 문 하나만이 서 있다. 자물쇠는 없다. 문고리만 돌리면 쉽게 열 수 있다.

segments.text: The round keyhole on the door feels warm.
segments.translation: 문에 달린 동그란 자물쇠에서 따듯한 온기가 느껴졌다.

segments.text: Relax, Vertin. The best is yet to come!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 진정해, 버틴. 진짜 재미있는 건 이제부터야!

segments.text: Wait till we take a breath of the real air ... Till we stuff ourselves with delicious food ... And till we get back to our country ...
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 진짜 공기를 마실 수 있을 때까지... 맛있는 음식을 배불리 먹을 수 있을 때까지... 그리고 우리 고향으로 돌아갈 수 있을 때까지...

segments.text: There's so much more for us to be shivering at, but in excitement!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 우리가 떨어야 할 일들이 훨씬 더 많이 있어, 하지만 그건 흥분 때문이지!

segments.text: You're right.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아.

segments.text: Let's open it together.
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 같이 열어보자.

segments.text: Three, two, one ...
segments.speaker: Student C
segments.translation: 셋, 둘, 하나...

segments.text: Their hands feel warm.
segments.translation: 모두의 손은 무척이나 따스했다.

segments.text: May the freedom be with us!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 자유가 우리와 함께하길!

segments.text: Let's goooo!
segments.speaker: Student B
segments.translation: 가자아아아!

segments.text: Vertin ...! Come outside!!
segments.speaker: Isabella
segments.translation: 버틴...! 밖으로 나와!!

segments.text: Freedom ...! Long live liberty ...!
segments.speaker: “The Ring”
segments.translation: 자유...! 해방 만세...!

segments.text: They wave at her happily.
segments.translation: 아이들은 기뻐하며 그녀에게 손을 흔들었다.

segments.text: There is a gentle push at the back; Vertin finds herself standing outside the door.
segments.translation: 등 뒤에서 부드럽게 밀리는 느낌과 함께, 버틴은 자신이 문 밖에 서 있다는 것을 깨달았다.

segments.text: Ha ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: The first thing that comes to her senses is a moist, complex smell, coming from various kinds of food.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 버틴이 가장 먼저 느낀 것은 각종 음식에서 나는 축축하고 복잡한 냄새였다.

segments.text: Then a loud thunder.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 거대한 천둥소리가 뒤를 이었다.

segments.text: Like a celebratory salute ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마치 축포를 쏘는 것처럼...

segments.text: Meanwhile, people's clothes fall to the ground like confetti.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사람들의 옷이 불꽃처럼 대지 위로 흩어졌다.

segments.text: At last, a scratchy sound, like something ferrous, falls on the ground.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마지막으로 들린 건 철로 만든 무언가가 바닥으로 굴러떨어지는 소리였다.

segments.text: Vertin.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 버틴.

segments.text: Do you want to be ... the Timekeeper?
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 너... 타임키퍼가 되고 싶어?

segments.text: Heh, checkmate.
segments.speaker: Constantine
segments.translation: 흐, 체크메이트.
